# Aurora Relayer v2

[![Project license](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Public%20Domain-blue.svg)](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)
[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/490367152054992913?label=Discord)](https://discord.gg/jNjHYUF8vw)

Web3-compatible relayer server for Aurora, implements; 
* a JSON-RPC server compatible with Ethereum's [Web3 API] for [Aurora Engine] instances deployed on the NEAR Protocol.
* an indexer which continuously reads JSON files generated by [Aurora Refiner] and populate local embedded storage

**This document is useful for developers, contributors and those who would like to build, run and experiment Aurora Relayer v2 natively. 
For packaged releases please see the distribution project [Aurora Relayer v2 Dist] which containerizes and packs [Aurora Relayer v2] and [Aurora Refiner] for end users** 

## Prerequisites and Dependencies

* requires [Go] and [Make] to build from source
* requires a NEAR account and signing key to start relayer, see [Configuration]
* requires JSON files, generated by [Aurora Refiner], to index blocks
* depends on [Aurora Relayer v2 Base] library which provides common functionality for public and private Aurora Relayer implementations

## How To Build

```bash
git clone https://github.com/aurora-is-near/relayer2-public.git
cd relayer2-public
make
```

build artifacts are placed in `out` directory
* relayer executable
* config directory
* build.info file

## How To Use
Relayer requires a set of configuration files to start (see [Configuration] for details), and default configuration files for `mainnet` and `testnet` are 
provided under `config` directory after build process. If config file path is not specified, Relayer starts with `config/testnet.yaml` 
by default.

### Mainnet
```bash
export AURORA_RELAYER_ENDPOINT_ENGINE_SIGNER=<signer> # or set in config/mainnet.yaml
export AURORA_RELAYER_ENDPOINT_ENGINE_SIGNERKEY=<path to Near Credentials file> # or set in config/mainnet.yaml
./relayer start --config config/mainnet.yaml
```

### Testnet
```bash
export AURORA_RELAYER_ENDPOINT_ENGINE_SIGNER=<signer> # or set in config/testnet.yaml
export AURORA_RELAYER_ENDPOINT_ENGINE_SIGNERKEY=<path to Near Credentials file> # or set in config/testnet.yaml
./relayer start # default config file is config/testnet.yaml
```

### Commands available
| command | description                        |
|---------|------------------------------------|
| start   | starts relayer with default config |
| version | prints relayer version info        |
| help    | prints usage                       |

for detailed explanation and flags of each command see help
```bash
./relayer <command> --help
```

## How To Configure


| Config Name                                   | Environment Variable Name <br/>(prefix AURORA_RELAYER_) | Default                                      | Runtime Change | Description                                                                                                                                         |
|-----------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------|----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| logger.level                                  | LOGGER_LEVEL                                            | `info`                                       | ‚úÖ              | root logger level                                                                                                                                   |
| logger.filePath                               | LOGGER_FILEPATH                                         | `/tmp/relayer/log/relayer.log`               | ‚ùå              | path to log file(s)                                                                                                                                 |
| logger.logToConsole                           | LOGGER_LOGTOCONSOLE                                     | `true`                                       | ‚ùå              | logs are sent to stdout                                                                                                                             |
| logger.logToFile                              | LOGGER_LOGTOFILE                                        | `true`                                       | ‚ùå              | logs are sent to log file, see logger.filePath                                                                                                      |
| db.badger.core.gcIntervalSeconds              | BADGER_CORE_GCINTERVALSECONDS                           | `10`                                         | ‚ùå              | BadgerDB garbage collector trigger period                                                                                                           |
| db.badger.core.scanRangeThreshold             | BADGER_CORE_SCANRANGETHRESHOLD                          | `3000`                                       | ‚ùå              | log scan range                                                                                                                                      |
| db.badger.core.maxScanIterators               | BADGER_CORE_MAXSCANITERATORS                            | `10000`                                      | ‚ùå              | max log scan iterators                                                                                                                              |
| db.badger.core.filterTtlMinutes               | BADGER_CORE_FILTERTTLMINUTES                            | `15`                                         | ‚ùå              | retention time for stored filters (not used)                                                                                                        |
| db.badger.core.options                        |                                                         |                                              |                | see [BadgerDB] for more options                                                                                                                     |
| db.badger.core.options.Dir                    | BADGER_CORE_OPTIONS_DIR                                 | `/tmp/relayer/data`                          | ‚ùå              | see [BadgerDB] for details                                                                                                                          |
| db.badger.core.options.ValueDir               | BADGER_CORE_OPTIONS_VALUEDIR                            | `/tmp/relayer/data`                          | ‚ùå              | see [BadgerDB] for details                                                                                                                          |
| db.badger.core.options.InMemory               | BADGER_CORE_OPTIONS_INMEMORY                            | `false`                                      | ‚ùå              | see [BadgerDB] for details                                                                                                                          |
| db.badger.core.options.DetectConflicts        | BADGER_CORE_OPTIONS_DETECTCONFLICTS                     | `false`                                      | ‚ùå              | see [BadgerDB] for details                                                                                                                          |
| endpoint.filterFilePath                       | ENDPOINT_FILTERFILEPATH                                 | `config/filter.yaml`                         | ‚ùå              | path to filter configuration file that specifies whitelist/blacklist based on IP, EOA, CA                                                           |
| endpoint.engine.nearNetworkID                 | ENDPOINT_ENGINE_NEARNETWORKID                           | user should specify :heavy_exclamation_mark: | ‚ùå              | e.g.: mainnet, testnet                                                                                                                              |
| endpoint.engine.nearNodeURL                   | ENDPOINT_ENGINE_NEARNODEURL                             | user should specify :heavy_exclamation_mark: | ‚ùå              | URL of a Near Node to communicate                                                                                                                   |
| endpoint.engine.signer                        | ENDPOINT_ENGINE_SIGNER                                  | user should specify :heavy_exclamation_mark: | ‚ùå              | to be able to communicate with Near Node, user must have a Near account                                                                             |
| endpoint.engine.signerKey                     | ENDPOINT_ENGINE_SIGNERKEY                               | user should specify :heavy_exclamation_mark: | ‚ùå              | path to JSON file containing the Near Credentials. To be able to communicate with Near Node, user must have a Near signer key associated to account |
| endpoint.engine.asyncSendRawTxs               | ENDPOINT_ENGINE_ASYNCSENDRAWTXS                         | `true`                                       | ‚ùå              | if true, transaction calls to Near Node are made in async. fashion                                                                                  |
| endpoint.engine.minGasPrice                   | ENDPOINT_ENGINE_MINGASPRICE                             | `0`                                          | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| endpoint.engine.minGasLimit                   | ENDPOINT_ENGINE_MINGASLIMIT                             | `21000`                                      | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| endpoint.engine.gasForNearTxsCall             | ENDPOINT_ENGINE_GASFORREARTXSCALL                       | `300000000000000`                            | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| endpoint.engine.depositForNearTxsCall         | ENDPOINT_ENGINE_DEPOSITEFORNEARTXSCALL                  | `0`                                          | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| endpoint.engine.retryWaitTimeMsForNearTxsCall | ENDPOINT_ENGINE_RETRYWAITTIMEMSFORNEXTTXSCALL           | `3000`                                       | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| endpoint.engine.retryNumberForNearTxsCall     | ENDPOINT_ENGINE_RETRYNUMBERFORNEXTNEARTXSCALL           | `3`                                          | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| endpoint.eth.protocolVersion                  | ENDPOINT_ETH_PROTOCOLVERSION                            | `0x41`                                       | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| endpoint.eth.hashrate                         | ENDPOINT_ETH_HASHRATE                                   | `0`                                          | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| endpoint.eth.gasEstimate                      | ENDPOINT_ETH_GASESTIMATE                                | `0x6691b7`                                   | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| endpoint.eth.gasPrice                         | ENDPOINT_ETH_GASPRICE                                   | `0x42c1d80`                                  | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| endpoint.eth.proxyEndpoints.url               | ENDPOINT_ETH_PROXYENDPOINTS_URL                         | `https://testnet.aurora.dev:443`             | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| endpoint.eth.proxyEndpoints.endpoints         | ENDPOINT_ETH_PROXYENDPOINTS_ENDPOINTS                   | empty list                                   | ‚úÖ              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| endpoint.eth.proxyEndpoints.disabledEndpoints | ENDPOINT_ETH_DISABLEDENDPOINTS                          | empty list                                   | ‚úÖ              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| rpcNode.geth.HTTPHost                         | RPCNODE_GETH_HTTPHOST                                   | "localhost"                                  | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| rpcNode.geth.HTTPPort                         | RPCNODE_GETH_HTTPPORT                                   | "8545"                                       | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| rpcNode.geth.HTTPVirtualHosts                 | RPCNODE_GETH_HTTPVIRTUALHOSTS                           | `["localhost"]`                              | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| rpcNode.geth.HTTPModules                      | RPCNODE_GETH_HTTPMODULES                                | `["net", "web3", "eth", "parity"]`           | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| rpcNode.geth.WSHost                           | RPCNODE_GETH_WSHOST                                     | "localhost"                                  | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| rpcNode.geth.WSPort                           | RPCNODE_GETH_WSPORT                                     | "8545"                                       | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| rpcNode.geth.WSModules                        | RPCNODE_GETH_WSMODULES                                  | `["net", "web3", "eth", "parity"]`           | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| indexer.sourceFolder                          | INDEXER_SOURCE_FOLDER                                   | `/tmp/relayer/json/`                         | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| indexer.subFolderBatchSize                    | INDEXER_SUBFOLDERBATCHSIZE                              | `10000`                                      | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| indexer.keepFiles                             | INDEXER_KEEPFILES                                       | `false`                                      | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| indexer.genesisBlock                          | INDEXER_GENESISBLOCK                                    | `9820210`                                    | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| indexer.fromBlock                             | INDEXER_FROMBLOCK                                       | `9820210`                                    | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| indexer.toBlock                               | INDEXER_TOBLOCK                                         | `0`                                          | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| indexer.retryCountOnFailure                   | INDEXER_RETRYCOUNTONFAILURE                             | `10`                                         | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |
| indexer.waitForBlocksMs                       | INDEXER_WAITFORBLOCKMS                                  | `500`                                        | ‚ùå              |                                                                                                                                                     |

|---------------------------------------------|--------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

| [`eth_call`]                                | ‚ùå      | Handled by standalone                                                                      |
| [`eth_chainId`]                             | ‚úÖ      |                                                                                            |
| [`eth_coinbase`]                            | ‚úÖ      |                                                                                            |
| eth_compileLLL                              | ‚ùå      | Unsupported                                                                                |
| eth_compileSerpent                          | ‚ùå      | Unsupported                                                                                |
| eth_compileSolidity                         | ‚ùå      | Unsupported                                                                                |
| [`eth_estimateGas`]                         | ‚úÖ      |                                                                                            |

| [`txpool_content`]                          | ‚úÖ      | Geth extension                                                                             |
| [`txpool_inspect`]                          | ‚úÖ      | Geth extension                                                                             |
| [`txpool_status`]                           | ‚úÖ      | Geth extension                                                                             |
| [`parity_pendingTransactions`]              | ‚úÖ      | Parity extension                                                                           |

**Legend**: ‚ùå = not supported. üöß = work in progress. ‚úÖ = supported.

## Versioning

* `2.0.0` is the initial version of [Aurora Relayer v2]
* [Aurora Relayer v1] is being deprecated, and not source code compatible with this version.
* We are following Go lang's practices and applying semantic versioning `vMAJOR[.MINOR[.PATCH[-PRERELEASE][+BUILD]]]`
    * `MAJOR` indicates backward incompatibility
    * `MINOR` backward compatible and stable release with new features and/or bug fixes
    * `PATCH` backward compatible and stable release for hot-fixes published out of planned release cycle
    * `PRERELEASE` does not guarantees stability, mostly used for QA cycles, e.g.: `alpha`, `beta` with optional build number
